Legacy TE USB Loader 2.5 \\Configurable SD/USB Loader v70r78.11 by oggzee, usptactical, gannon, Dr. Clipper, R2-D2199, FIX94, airline38, Howard, NiTRo THe DeMoN 20180513 Legacy Team \\Kirbeast, waffeln Legacy TE USB Loader
Legacy Tournament Edition is a custom build of Project M that aims to be an alternate option to Project M 3.6 for use in tourneys, smash fests, and netplay matches. TE leaves PM 3.6's character roster, movesets, and universal physics engine untouched while offering additional tourney-legal skins and stages. Project M, the modification of Brawl upon which TE is based, is inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee's gameplay and brings technical variety to all characters.
This is a modified version of CFG USB Loader designed for instantly loading Legacy TE with USB.
RSBE01 intro = 0 device = usb partition = auto ios = 249 video = system video_patch = all language = english ocarina = 1 hooktype = axframe
